rows.label: tlk4110012701_msg0001
rows.name:
My leg's finally back to normal!
I can run and jump around with it
like nothing ever even happened!

rows.label: tlk4110012701_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm trying my best to help out without
getting attacked by monsters now.

rows.label: tlk4110012701_msg0003
rows.name:
Oh, and I tried building something all
by myself now, a little bookcase!

rows.label: tlk4110012701_msg0004
rows.name:
It's so hard to cut wood straight.
I don't know how Dad does it!
